co.cask.cdap.api.procedure
Interface ProcedureSpecification

All Superinterfaces:
ProgramSpecification, PropertyProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultProcedureSpecification
public interface ProcedureSpecification
extends ProgramSpecification, PropertyProvider

This class defines a specification for a Procedure. A Procedure runtime attributes are always defined using this class. Instance of this class should be created through the ProcedureSpecification.Builder class by invoking the ProcedureSpecification.Builder.with() method.

Nested Class Summary
static class ProcedureSpecification.Builder
          Builder for building ProcedureSpecification.
